CORE_MISSION.statement: Schools buy the app. They own their data. Forever.

COMPLETED: ✅ iOS platform added (npx cap add ios)
✅ iOS sync complete (npx cap sync ios)
✅ ios/ folder with Xcode project ready
BLOCKED_BY_USER: ❌ Cannot test in iOS Simulator without Xcode

USER_ACTION_REQUIRED.step1: Open App Store on your Mac
USER_ACTION_REQUIRED.step2: Search for 'Xcode' and install it (it's free, ~12GB)
USER_ACTION_REQUIRED.step4: Then run: npx cap open ios
USER_ACTION_REQUIRED.step5: In Xcode, select iPhone simulator and click Play button
